ee:transform.doc:name: Build generic error body & HTTP status

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output application/json import try from dw::Runtime
var safe = (v) -> (try(() -> v).result) var asText = (v) -> (v default "") as String
var typeToStatus = { "APP:TOO_MANY_REQUESTS": 429, "APP:TIMEOUT": 504, "APP:SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE": 503, "APP:FORBIDDEN": 403, "APP:NOT_FOUND": 404, "APP:METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED": 405, "APP:BAD_REQUEST": 400, "HTTP:UNAUTHORIZED": 401, "HTTP:FORBIDDEN": 403, "HTTP:NOT_FOUND": 404, "HTTP:METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED": 405, "HTTP:CONNECTIVITY": 502, "HTTP:TIMEOUT": 504 }
fun typeKey(err) = if (safe(err.errorType.namespace) != null and safe(err.errorType.identifier) != null) (err.errorType.namespace as String) ++ ":" ++ (err.errorType.identifier as String) else "APP:INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR"
fun statusFrom(err) = if (safe(err.errorMessage.payload.errors[0].code) != null) (err.errorMessage.payload.errors[0].code default 500) as Number else if (safe(err.muleMessage.attributes.StatusCode) != null) (err.muleMessage.attributes.StatusCode default 500) as Number else (typeToStatus[typeKey(err)] default 500) as Number
fun messageFrom(err, pl) = asText( safe(pl.customErrorMessage) default safe(err.errorMessage.payload.errors[0].message) default safe(err.detailedDescription) default safe(err.description) default "" )
fun descriptionFrom(err) = asText( safe(err.errorMessage.payload.errors[0].description) default safe(err.detailedDescription) default "" )
fun errorTypeFrom(err) = if (safe(err.errorMessage.payload.errors[0].errorType) != null) asText(err.errorMessage.payload.errors[0].errorType) else typeKey(err)
fun layerFrom() = (p("json.logger.application.name") default p("mule.app.name") default "mule-app") as String
--- { errors: [{ code: statusFrom(error), errorType: errorTypeFrom(error), description: descriptionFrom(error), message: messageFrom(error, payload), layer: layerFrom() }] }
